MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA8 postcode area of Ayr, affecting properties in Cowan Crescent and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified an underground cable fault on Cowan Crescent and for safety concerns we need to isolate additional customers in the area. Your supply may be affected by this. We now expect your supply to be restored by 6am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:09am on 14th January
